TopicTitle: How many people are in the dev team?

Articles.Content: title says it all, I'd just like to know it so I know what I can expect of the developers.

The forum usergroup shows fourteen devs, but the SQUAD account is a general account and Maxmaps isn't a developer as such if I recall correctly, also not sure if adnominom is. That leaves eleven or twelve developers
About a month ago someone of them said that there are 12 developers. They hired Bac9 since then, so there are 13 now, if I didn't forget anyone.
Do all the developers live in Mexico? They've hired quite a few modders, so do some of them work over the internet?

Do all the developers live in Mexico? They've hired quite a few modders, so do some of them work over the internet?

I guess devs work via Internet. I seriously doubt Squad is in position to relocate devs.

I guess devs work via Internet. I seriously doubt Squad is in position to relocate devs.

And most likely holds meetings via Skype.
We work as a worldwide team. I'm not entirely sure, but I think the team in Mexico is outnumbered by our awesome international team.

We work as a worldwide team. I'm not entirely sure, but I think the team in Mexico is outnumbered by our awesome international team.
I never heard of you. Are you new to the team?
Starting my third week at the job. New PR guy.
Quite ironic that you're a new PR guy and yet we know nothing about you.

Starting my third week at the job. New PR guy.
Why is your name orange if your a PR guy? I thought only developers have orange names?

Been working outside of the box for now! Probably wouldn't hurt to make an intro thread in the proper part of the forums though. Hmm.

Why is your name orange if your a PR guy? I thought only developers have orange names?
Unsure! Is there a proper color for management staff? Edited May 27, 2013 by Maxmaps
